sources: KPCC reporting, official law enforcement sources and coverage for news organizations including L.A. Times, The Associated Press, NBC4, ABC7, CBS2, KCAL9 and CNN.
headline: Timeline: The search for Christopher Dorner
text:
This curated timeline tracks events and coverage in connection with the week-long search for 33-year-old murder suspect and ex-LAPD police officer Christopher Dorner.

If you know of other information that should be included in this timeline send us an email. Also we invite you to join the discussion about these events at KPCC's Facebook page.
